module.name: pdm_material_aspects
module.name.french: Aspects matériaux traités par la gestion de données techniques (GDT) des produits

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of aspects of products related to their material composition.
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been split off into the new module generic_material_aspects:

For upward compatibility they are included into this module by a USE FROM declaration. In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: identification of the material of a product;
identification of product properties derived from the material composition of a product;
representation of the value of a material property as specified or measured in a particular environment.

outscope.li: description of the composition of a material.
